# GitHub Copilot documentation

You can use GitHub Copilot to enhance your productivity and assist as you work on code.

[Overview](/copilot/get-started/what-is-github-copilot) [Quickstart](/copilot/get-started/quickstart)

## Articles

All categories

[Manage Copilot for a team

### About billing for GitHub Copilot in organizations and enterprises

Learn about pricing and billing cycles for Copilot.](/en/copilot/concepts/billing/organizations-and-enterprises)[Learn about Copilot

### About billing for individual GitHub Copilot plans

Learn how billing works for Copilot Pro and Copilot Pro+.](/en/copilot/concepts/billing/billing-for-individuals)[Learn about Copilot

### About Copilot auto model selection

Automatically select models for Copilot Chat and Copilot coding agent.](/en/copilot/concepts/auto-model-selection)[Configure Copilot

### About customizing GitHub Copilot responses

Learn about customizing the behavior of GitHub Copilot to fit with your preferences and requirements.](/en/copilot/concepts/prompting/response-customization)[Learn about Copilot

### About GitHub Copilot Chat

Learn how you can use GitHub Copilot Chat to enhance your coding experience.](/en/copilot/concepts/chat)[Learn about Copilot

### About GitHub Copilot CLI

Find out about using Copilot from the command line.](/en/copilot/concepts/agents/about-copilot-cli)[Learn about Copilot

### About GitHub Copilot code review

Find out how Copilot can review pull requests for you.](/en/copilot/concepts/agents/code-review)[Learn about Copilot

### About GitHub Copilot coding agent

You can ask Copilot to open a new pull request or make changes to an existing pull request. Copilot works in the background, then requests a review from you.](/en/copilot/concepts/agents/coding-agent/about-coding-agent)[Learn about Copilot

### About GitHub Copilot Spaces

Understand how organizing and sharing context with Copilot Spaces can improve your Copilot Chat in GitHub results and help your collaborators.](/en/copilot/concepts/context/spaces)
